```{r}
library(data.table)
library(RcppCNPy)
library("factoextra")
library('ggfortify')
library('cowplot')
library('dplyr')
library(ggpubr)
library('patchwork')
library(wesanderson)
library(ggsci)

nice_layout<-   theme_cowplot()+
    panel_border(color = "grey85", size = 1, linetype = 1,
  remove = FALSE, "black")


library('ggfortify')


covariantes<- fread('/Users/josedias/mount/scratch/jgoncal1/outputs/valores_pca_116.cov')

PCS<-prcomp(covariantes)


Species<-c(rep('A. caudatus', 28), rep('A. cruentus', 21), rep('A. hybridus', 9),  rep('A. hypochondriacus', 18), rep('A. quitensis', 12))




PCS$rotation[,2]

identification<- fread('/Users/josedias/mount/projects/ag-stetter/jdias/projects/Genome_browser/data/sampleID_AmaranthGDB', header = F)

grafico<- autoplot(prcomp(covariantes)) +
  geom_point(aes()) +
  nice_layout
  # scale_color_manual(values=ggsc(n=3, name="Darjeeling"))
# scale_fill_discrete(name = "Species", labels = species)
grafico

ggsave("/Users/josedias/Desktop/sup_pca.png", grafico,  dpi = 300,   device = "png", height = 4)





pc1_2<- ggplot(PCS, aes(PCS$x[,1],PCS$x[,2]))+
    geom_point(aes(color=Species),  shape = 19, size = 3 , alpha = 0.55) +
  xlab("PC 1 (65.16%)") +
  ylab("PC 2 (28.82%)") +
  nice_layout +
  # theme(legend.title = element_text(size = 15),
  #       legend.text = element_text(size = 15))+
    scale_color_locuszoom() +
    scale_fill_locuszoom()

pc1_2
pc2_3<- ggplot(PCS, aes(PCS$x[,1],PCS$x[,3]))+
      geom_point(aes(color=Species), shape = 19, size = 3, , alpha = 0.55)  +
  xlab("PC 1 (65.16%)") +
  ylab("PC 3 (1.62%)") +
  nice_layout +
    scale_color_locuszoom() +
    scale_fill_locuszoom()


pc2_3
```

When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the *Preview* button or press *Cmd+Shift+K* to preview the HTML file).
